content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today?
Put me through to a manager NOW! I don't want to talk to a robot. This is urgent!
I understand your urgency and I want to help you as quickly as possible. I can escalate your request to a human manager. Please hold on a moment while I connect you.
reason: Customer demanded to speak to manager and refused to engage with AI.
